title: What are the best & the worst BTS lyrics? - Quora

response.answer_text: ALL SONGS ARE AMAZING (not because I am an ARMY ) they talk about themselves and express themselves through their songs. their hardships,their pain,their dedication, their effort + days and nights of endless practice . all these are the dedication and hard work that they put into their songs. so therefore, all BTS song are AMAZING . none of them are good or bad, they are all amazing. . . . . . . . . . . . . . BECAUSE THEY ARE BTS THEY RULE THE ARMY PLANET
